title: Your Local Artmacy
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:much-cool]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
[[module css]]
#page-title {
  display: none;
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
#header {
    height: 350px;
    background-image: url('https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-local-h-art-macy/snake-removebg-preview.png');
    background-position: 50% 25%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size:300px auto;
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.flex-container {
    display: flex;
}

.flex-item {
    flex: 1; 
}

/* Media query for smaller screens */
@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
    .flex-container {
        flex-direction: column; /* Stack items vertically on smaller screens */
    }

[[/module]]

@@     @@
@@     @@

[[=]]

[[module CSS]]
/* Apply a border to all images with the class 'picture' */
.picture {
  border: 2px solid #0d0c00; /* 2px solid border with a light gray color */
  border-radius: 8px; /* Optional: Add rounded corners for a softer look */
  background-image: radial-gradient(#01010f, #01010f);
  margin: 10px; /* Optional: Add some margin for spacing between pictures */
  float: left; /* Float the images to the left to make them appear side by side */
  width: calc(33.33% - 20px); /* Set the width to one-third of the container with some margin */
 width: 300px;
  height: 335px;
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Include borders in the width calculation */
  clear: none; /* Prevent the images from clearing the float */
}

/* Optional: Add hover effect for a subtle interaction */
.picture:hover {
  border-color: #452299; /* Darker border color on hover */
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
/* Apply a border to all images with the class 'picture' */
.plaque {
  border: 2px solid #0d0c00; /* 2px solid border with a light gray color */
  border-radius: 8px; /* Optional: Add rounded corners for a softer look */
  background-image: radial-gradient(#00008B, #01010f);
  margin: 10px; /* Optional: Add some margin for spacing between pictures */
  float: left; /* Float the images to the left to make them appear side by side */
  width: calc(33.33% - 20px); /* Set the width to one-third of the container with some margin */
 width: 320px;
  height: 75px;
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Include borders in the width calculation */
  clear: none; /* Prevent the images from clearing the float */
}

/* Optional: Add hover effect for a subtle interaction */
.picture:hover {
  border-color: #452299; /* Darker border color on hover */
}

[[/module]]


[[module CSS]]

  margin: 10px; /* Optional: Add some margin for spacing between pictures */
  float: left; /* Float the images to the left to make them appear side by side */

 width: 300px;
  height: 75px;
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Include borders in the width calculation */
  clear: none; /* Prevent the images from clearing the float */
}

/* Optional: Add hover effect for a subtle interaction */

[[/module]]


[[module CSS]]
/* Apply a border to all images with the class 'picture' */

  background-image: radial-gradient(#AA336A, #01010f);
  margin: 10px; /* Optional: Add some margin for spacing between pictures */
  float: left; /* Float the images to the left to make them appear side by side */
  width: calc(33.33% - 20px); /* Set the width to one-third of the container with some margin */
 width: 300px;
  height: 75px;
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Include borders in the width calculation */
  clear: none; /* Prevent the images from clearing the float */
}

/* Optional: Add hover effect for a subtle interaction */

[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
/* Apply a border to all images with the class 'picture' */
.plaque4 {
  border: 2px solid #0d0c00; /* 2px solid border with a light gray color */
  border-radius: 8px; /* Optional: Add rounded corners for a softer look */
  background-image: radial-gradient(#013220, #01010f);
  margin: 10px; /* Optional: Add some margin for spacing between pictures */
  float: left; /* Float the images to the left to make them appear side by side */
  width: calc(33.33% - 20px); /* Set the width to one-third of the container with some margin */
 width: 320px;
  height: 75px;
  box-sizing: border-box; /* Include borders in the width calculation */
  clear: none; /* Prevent the images from clearing the float */
}

/* Optional: Add hover effect for a subtle interaction */

  border-color: #452299; /* Darker border color on hover */
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="ambrose menu" style="border: solid 6px black; background-image: radial-gradient( #00008B, #000435); padding-top: 1em; padding-right: 0em; padding-bottom: 0em; margin-bottom: 0em; color: #FFF7D8;"]]


[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-local-h-art-macy/Header]]

[[div style="font-size: 25px; margin: 2%;"]]
Welcome to your Local Artmacy! May I take your prescription? 
[[/div]]

@@          @@
------
[[div class="picture"]]
[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-local-h-art-macy/SalamNarjeen.png alt="Description"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="font-size: 20px; margin:  10px;"]]

Hi! I'm Harmacy.  I'm a critter, author, and occasional artist in the SCP community. 

Figured it was finally time to make a colorful corner for myself on the wiki! Most of the pieces here are from contests, birthdays, or my writing. I'm excited to have a place to showcase my art, and eventually revisit it to see how far my work progresses as I continue to create and grow. 

[[/div]]
@@     @@
------

[[div style="font-size: 25px; margin: 5px;"]]
That said, thanks for visiting, and happy browsing! 
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
